markdownRemark.html:
POC with logio.org as a log monitoring tool

Running the test:

Install minikube

Follow the minibuke installation instruction for your OS https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/tools/install-minikube/

Start minikube

    minikube start --driver=virtualbox

Deploy logio

    kubectl apply -f logio-deployment.yaml

Start the service

    kubectl apply -f logio-service.yaml

Get it in the browser

    minikube service logio
